page.title: 10ABERDEEN DIALECT
page.content: {A list of words we use when {talking in the regional tongue.} cloot-cloth(n) dicht-quick wipe(v) simmet-vest(n) skelp,skud-smack(v) dubs-mud lumps(n) neep-turnip(n) brig-bridge(n) breeks-trousers(n) bide-live(v) fitbaa-football(n,v) kist-case(n) dreech-damp weather(adj) braw-nice(adj) sassanach-Englishman(n) faan-when? aye-yes! wee-small(adj) loon-boy(n) een-eye(n) quine-girl(n) mannie-man(n) div-do(n) wifie-woman(n) brae-steep hill(n) skean dhu-dagger(n) glen-valley(n) dinna ken-don't know faa-where?,who? fit-foot(n),what? wheest-be quiet! awa-away,disbelief! nae bad-alright(adj) lum-chimney(n) fit like-how are you? fit wiy-how? canny-careful(adj,adv) pluke-spot(n) foo-full up,drunk(adj) har-sea mist(n) fit's a dee-whats happening? piece-cake,sandwich(n) knowe-hill(n)
